title: The Bachelorette: Ciarran Stott STORMS OFF after spat with Jamie Doran
text:
He's one of the front-runners to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.

But it could be all over for fan favourite Ciarran Stott, who storms out of the cocktail party in an explosive trailer for Wednesday night's episode.

After confronting Jamie Doran in a heated conversation, the 25-year-old Englishman angrily walks off set and tells producers to 'get me out of here'.

'Get me out of here!' The Bachelorette star Ciarran Stott (right) storms off after confronting 'clinger' Jamie Doran at the cocktail party in an explosive trailer for Wednesday's episode

The promo begins with Jamie, 39, walking over to Angie and asking if he can have a private chat with her before the rose ceremony.

'This is going to hit you like a ton of bricks. These guys are going to wish I went last week after this chat,' he tells Angie.

After their conversation, the firefighter joins the other contestants and tells them that the Bachelorette is 'not happy'.

'She's not happy about what?' asks intruder Ryan Anderson.

Snitch! The promo begins with Jamie (left) walking over to Angie and asking if he can have a private chat with her before the rose ceremony

The trailer then shows Angie breaking down in tears after sending a mystery contestant home.

'I felt like we didn't have to wait for a rose ceremony,' she says in an emotional piece-to-camera interview.

After Angie makes her decision, Ciarran confronts Jamie about the conversation he had with her earlier in the evening.

Bombshell: 'This is going to hit you like a ton of bricks. These guys are going to wish I went last week after this chat,' Jamie tells Angie

Who will be leaving? Angie (pictured) then breaks down as she sends a contestant home

'You're the one throwing people under the bus!' Ciarran yells.

'You dug your own grave man,' agrees fellow suitor Alex McKay, before Carlin Sterritt tells Jamie to 'grow the hell up!'

Ciarran then angrily takes off his jacket and storms off set, saying: 'I'm f**king done with this... I'm over it, get me out of here!'

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: After confronting Jamie Doran in a heated conversation, the 25-year-old Englishman angrily walks off set and tells producers to 'get me out of here'
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
